title.rendered: Financial Commission Announces Launch of Forex News

content.rendered:
October 2nd,  2019, The Financial Commission today announces the launch of a Forex News section on its official website intended to inform traders, brokers and the public on important developments in the Forex and CFD markets, updates from broker members, warnings and regulatory actions that impact both traders and brokers alike.

Forex News

Website visitors can find the digest of news directly on the homepage of the Financial Commission website. The digest is specially curated by the Financial Commission’s editorial team to highlight the important factors shaping the Forex and CFD industry today.

The Forex News section will help people stay informed about regulatory actions against specific companies, new features, and tools launched for traders by member firms and industry developments that can influence traders and broker operations in different geographies.

Don’t forget to share – our website easily lets you share our articles simply by choosing the social media channel of your choice inside each of our news posts!

About Financial Commission

Financial Commission is an independent external dispute resolution (EDR) organization for consumers/traders who are unable to resolve disputes directly with their financial services providers that are members of the Financial Commission. Financial Commission initially set out to provide a new approach for traders and brokers alike to resolve any issues that arise in the course of trading electronic markets such as Foreign Exchange, and then expanded into CFDs and related derivatives, in addition to certifying technology platforms used for trading.

For more information please contact us at info@financialcommission.org.
